title: Egg Nogg
instructions: In a heavy saucepan, combine eggs, white sugar, & salt; gradually stir in milk. Stirring constantly, cook for 10-15 mins over med heat, until mixture just coats a metal spoon. Remove from heat, & stir in 1 tsp vanilla extract. Place saucepan over ice water until custard cools, & then refrigerate until chilled. In a chilled bowl, combine heavy cream, powdered sugar, & 1/2 tsp vanilla extract. Beat until stiff peaks form. Stir in rum. Fold whipped cream mixture into the cooled custard. Pour into serving bowl, & sprinkle with nutmeg. Serve immediately.
